welcome_message_body: Welcome to Coweta, USA! We are excited to have you visit our charming city known for its historical buildings and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Coweta has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tulsa International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tulsa International Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the airport by connecting to the TUL Free Wifi network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at R.Lloyd Jones Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at R.Lloyd Jones Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Okmulgee Airport serves all domestic flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Okmulgee Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.
